marketOfTime.name: Market of Time
marketOfTime.onSelectMessage:
{Market of Time}

You step into the Market of Time, where a mysterious keeper of time greets you. For a fee of 5000 gold, he offers to help you let go of one of your existing skills.
marketOfTime.onEmptyMessage:
{Market of Time}

You step into the Market of Time, where a mysterious keeper of time greets you. He offers to help you forget one of your skills... but sadly, you have none to forget.
